title: John Frieda Luxurious Volume Touchably Full Shampoo , 8.45 Ounce
description: Gently cleanses for volume that looks and feels natural. Patented formula contains specialized volume building technology paired with cleansing agents. The formula gently cleanses and detangles fine hair as it applies volume boosters, then rinses clean. Volume boosting technology is activated during blow dry to enhance hair’s natural volume, for hair that feels naturally full and soft. Ingredients: WATER, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, COCAMIDE MEA, SODIUM CHLORIDE, FRAGRANCE, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, BENZYL ALCOHOL, DISODIUM EDTA, SILICONE QUATERNIUM-18, LAURETH-16, MALIC ACID, POLYQUATERNIUM-52, TRIDECETH-6, PEG-12 DIMETHICONE, GLYCINE, TRIDECETH-12, SEA SALT, PPG-9, ALCOHOL DENAT., AMP-ISOSTEAROYL HYDROLYZED WHEAT PROTEIN, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE

title: Joan Rivers Great Hair Day® fill-in powder by AsWeChange
description: Formulated with ProcapilTM, Joan Rivers Great Hair Day fill-in powder strengthens hair while providing instant fullness. Applied to your scalp with the included brush, Joan Rivers hair powder resists running yet washes off without staining. This hair loss product for women includes flipopen mirror. Specify color code. 0.24 oz.

title: Tigi Bed Head Suger Dust invisible Micro-texture Root Powder for Unisex, 0.035 Ounce
description: What's on the menu today: superior volume with staying powder. We'll take as much as we can get, please! With Sugar Dust from Bed Head, it's yours for the taking! ; This invisible micro-texture powder adds volume to your hair, no matter how fine or limp it might be. Leaves your hair feeling fresh and full of life, never greasy or flat. Allows movement and texture. Helps control excess oil. To use: Lightly shake wherever you desire a little more volume and texture, and then use your fingertips to work the product into your scalp. Style as desired. Measurements: ; Capacity: 0.035 oz
